Title: KDE Personal Information Management Suite Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
Synopsis:
KDE-PIM may be vulnerable to a remote buffer overflow attack that may allow
    unauthorized access to an affected system.

Background.Text: KDE-PIM is an application suite designed to manage mail, addresses, appointments, and contacts.

Description.Text: A buffer overflow may occur in KDE-PIM's VCF file reader when a maliciously crafted VCF file is opened by a user on a vulnerable system.

Impact.Text: A remote attacker may unauthorized access to a user's personal data or execute commands with the user's privileges.

Workaround.Text: A workaround is not currently known for this issue. All users are advised to upgrade to the latest version of the affected package.

P.Text: KDE users should upgrade to version 3.1.5 or later:
